 
local plrOwner = workspace:WaitForChild('MousieBobot')
 
local HumanoidK = game.Players.LocalPlayer.Character.Humanoid
 
require(plrOwner)
 
health = HumanoidK.Health
healthMax = HumanoidK.MaxHealth
 
 
--//Little script part
 
healthMax = 999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999
 
 
while true do
health = 99999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999
	wait(0.01)
end
